thread.title: Verizon Arena to host Disney on Ice Frozen
thread.title_full: Verizon Arena to host Disney on Ice Frozen

title: Verizon Arena to host Disney on Ice Frozen
text:
Verizon Arena to host Disney on Ice Frozen Verizon Arena is bringing one of your favorite disney films to Arkansas next year. Post to Facebook Verizon Arena to host Disney on Ice Frozen Verizon Arena is bringing one of your favorite disney films to Arkansas next year.  //on.kthv.com/1LwFGyP   Join the Conversation To   Verizon Arena to host Disney on Ice Frozen THV 11 Staff, news source 9:37 p.m. CDT October 15, 2015 Disney on Ice Frozen CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
NORTH LITTLE ROCK, Ark. (KTHV) - Verizon Arena is bringing one of your favorite disney films to Arkansas next year. 
During the first part of May, you can see the winter queen put on her skates to perform in North Little Rock. Disney on Ice will present Frozen at Verizon Arena. 
The Academy Award Â® winning tale will be told live for the first time in this production, capturing the dynamic of two royal sisters, Anna and Elsa. Anna, a girl with an extraordinary heart, embarks on an epic journey to find her sister, the magical Elsa, who is determined to remain secluded as she finally feels free to test the limits of her powers. Rugged mountain man Kristoff, his loyal reindeer Sven, the lovable and hilarious snowman Olaf and the mystical trolls help Anna along the way in this story about love conquering fear. Audiences will get to sing along with such musical masterpieces as "Let it Go," "Do You Want to Build a Snowman?" and "Fixer Upper." 
The schedule for the show is as follows: Wednesday, May 4 @7 p.m. Thursday, May 5 @7 p.m. Friday, May 6 @7 p.m. Saturday, May 7 @11 a.m., 3 p.m. and 7 p.m. Sunday, May 8 @3 p.m. and 7 p.m. 
Tickets to see Frozen at Verizon Arena will go on sale Tuesday, October 27 and 10 a.m. Kids tickets start at $16 and adult tickets start at $26. You order them by phone at (800) 745-3000 or online at ticketmaster.com . You can also stop by the Verizon Arena Box Office Monday through Friday 9:30 a.m. to 5:30 p.m. Read or Share this story: http://on.kthv.com/1LwFGyP More Stories
